name: Blue Hydrangeas in the Garbage Pile of Tumblr
description: THIS DASHBOARD THEME IS AN UPDATED VERSION OF SPRING DAISIES IN THE GARBAGE PILE OF TUMBLR. Blue Hydrangeas in the Garbage Pile of Tumblr is a Tumblr dashboard theme that makes it a little bit easier to use the website after the staff has butchered its layout over and over again. Compatible with most X-Kit extensions!
additional_info:
VERSION 2.1.5: Released May 13th, 2016
Bug fix to remove background color of recommended posts.
STYLE INFORMATION — six preset color schemes to choose from OR make your own color scheme — optional font replacements — fixes some XKit extensions that broke with the newer updates — countless tweaks to make the dashboard look cleaner DISCLAIMER: I made this style using Google Chrome and it should work perfectly while using Chrome or Firefox. However, I have not tested this style using other browsers (such as Opera or Safari) so I'm not sure if there will be compatibility issues in those browsers. If you are experiencing problems in browsers other than Chrome or Firefox, please post a question about the problem and include a screenshot if you can.
